channel.title: The type of server someone should really make
channel.description: Just a suggestion to anybody creating a server that will have a dedi and WILL STAY UP. this is the server that will get you the most members. Make a server where all skills are used, like real rsc. no free pots, no free fish. make exp perfect though. not as low as rsca, not as high as some. maybe like 50x. make the economy good and make low level pking come back (like level 30s-60s) where stuff actually counts and it doesnt get boring to pk after an hour. most servers, stuff is so easy to get, you just keep going back and dont care if you die. thats not what pking is about\takes the fun out of it. flame me if you want, this is just a suggestion to what somebody should put in a server.

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

shifty1:

I have a couple of dedicated servers (I run a game server company), and I’m willing to have a real go at running a proper RSC clone, which is why i’ve been trying to look for the original unedited rscd v25 by reines.

/search

Read full topic

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @owntx3 owntx3
item.description:
@owntx3 wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:32, topic:226589”][quote author=owntx3 link=topic=297758.msg2395694#msg2395694 date=1219156751]
people will pk, if you dont think that look at rsc 99% of everyone autoed and more people pked then any of these servers, SHIT ACTUALLY COUNTED, like when you won something it actually meant something and super sets and shit all cost money that took a hit to your pocket.
and K09, thats easy coming from you where people are already botting on your server.
[/quote]

Lol what does people autoing on my server have to do with allowing it?

As you said, a lot of people auto’d on RSC but that doesn’t mean Jagex wanted them to… And besides, if EVERYONE auto’d on RSC (which they do now) the game would have died a long, long time ago.

Offical RSC is now shit. Botting on RSC back before RS2 only worked because a very small proportion of the over-all population did it, and a number of those were caught.[/quote]u do speak the truth. rsc is now shit but thats because everyones banned [including myself] from that one big ban wave like 2 years ago. i know you dont want people autoing on ur server, im just saying its going to happen. i have no idea how this conversation got into this hahaha i just wanted to give someone a suggestion of a type of server to make. and just to let u know autoing still works on rs2, im doing it right now

Read full topic
item.source: The type of server someone should really make

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“owntx3, post:25, topic:226589”]people will pk, if you dont think that look at rsc 99% of everyone autoed and more people pked then any of these servers, SHIT ACTUALLY COUNTED, like when you won something it actually meant something and super sets and shit all cost money that took a hit to your pocket.
and K09, thats easy coming from you where people are already botting on your server.[/quote]

Lol what does people autoing on my server have to do with allowing it?

As you said, a lot of people auto’d on RSC but that doesn’t mean Jagex wanted them to… And besides, if EVERYONE auto’d on RSC (which they do now) the game would have died a long, long time ago.

Offical RSC is now shit. Botting on RSC back before RS2 only worked because a very small proportion of the over-all population did it, and a number of those were caught.

Read full topic

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“owntx3, post:25, topic:226589”]people will pk, if you dont think that look at rsc 99% of everyone autoed and more people pked then any of these servers, SHIT ACTUALLY COUNTED, like when you won something it actually meant something and super sets and shit all cost money that took a hit to your pocket.
and K09, thats easy coming from you where people are already botting on your server.[/quote]

Yeah, because there were no other alternatives (servers) and it died out slowly. If there were a lot of alternatives just like now, it would have died a lot faster.

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @i_own_you21 i own you21
item.description:
@i_own_you21 wrote:

[quote=“Peter, post:26, topic:226589”][quote author=i own you21 link=topic=297758.msg2395690#msg2395690 date=1219156597]

if you have a replica of rsc, with working all skills and low exp rate, autoing will bring back a good healthy economy/pking/ people will play your server.
think about it, imagine RSCD(origonal by reines) how many people played it, but with a lower exp rate and allowing autos.now, dont get me wrong, it would only work if you released a bot along with it because most people here have no idea how to make one.

easyer to just put a phone on your enter button 0.0
[/quote]

Not when sleeping is enabled.[/quote]
ya

Read full topic

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Peter, post:20, topic:226589”][quote author=owntx3 link=topic=297758.msg2395661#msg2395661 date=1219155486]
someone should make a server with a sts built into the client but with really low xp rates like 5x (isnt that what rsca is?).
edit: xent how hard would it be for you to make sts compatibal(sp?) with these servers?
[/quote]

What the fuck is the point of allowing autoing? Why the fuck simply not higher the XP rate? The end result is the same - easy gain - fast items - loss of interest fast.

Why not simply allow item spawning and stat changing? [/quote]

My sentiments exactly.

Read full topic

item.title: The type of server someone should really make
item.dc:creator: @i_own_you21 i own you21
item.description:
@i_own_you21 wrote:

xEnt:

Don’t have the money to pay for a dedi, don’t have the time to manage everything or listen to people. I simply like to be hired for programming/setting up issues, not dealing with the public like a real admin would.

i would hire you but dont wanna buy a dedi and people will cry if there is a database reset and shit its totaly pointless to host a server now a days noone cares about the server all they care about are there stats say if there was a a bug in the sql file and you had to reset it like 99% of the people would quit there just dumbass’s like that
